attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a KFC worker i am constantly suffering abuse from the general public. I work in a KFC in Blackpool that is open as late as 2:30am,with no security measures what so ever! I have noticed that other fast food retail such as mcdonalds staff are far better protected! We have an open entrance and a low counter, i constantly fear it is just a matter of time b4 a serious attack occurs.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
